google_play_reviews.content: All is good best mobile game ever but please add Georgian kingdom
Works fine on my phone. Pixel graphics is the thing I wanted to experience with Civilization. I wouldn't say this game is smth new, but certainly a good adaptation of old.
Absolutely stunning game. I like that the devs are constantly improving the game such as game mechanics and design. I can't wait to see what the future holds. Keep up the good work!!!
Good game, but I still don't know how to get 'Crab' for my cities... Please reply my post with a solution (answer)
A great experience for people who enjoy classic turn based strategy.
UI is too much. Tutorial is not helpful in navigating through the tutorial itself. Some words require players to have pre exisiting knowledge in the genre.

Took me a while to enjoy the speed of the game and pleased I did. Gameplay is logical and it's rather relaxing. Well - I play on the easiest possible with the biggest map and 1 AI at the moment so yea - relaxing. Will add more soon. Maybe.
The developer has implemented a great strategy game. It's smooth and works without any big issues.
Yeah. Fantastic
Loving it

I've had numerous games in which, upon discovery of industrialization (many hours into the game), I find that despite having like 30% of the map to myself, I have 0 or 1 coal tile. (Coal is a critical resource without which you can't have the necessary productivity.) It's more than a little annoying to keep finding after an enormous time investment in a game that I never had a chance.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Really sorry!
REALLY hope this is fixed in 3.4.1-patch1
This has been a HELL of a week, and the most annoying part is that it's impossible for me to know ahead of time how different phones will respond to changes =(

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome civilization game. Plenty of depth and has a glimmer to it. Not a dull moment.

I still can't believe someone managed to make Civ 5 ported to android, and ad free as well! This passes the time on breaks at work and is almost the full game in tactical mode, with some dlc stuff currently missing. Two QoL features I'd love to see though: -Make roads easier to spot. I like how they look but I found they tend to get buried under clutter and hard to see. -Add some colour! I think it'd be nice to colour code buildings and/or unit icons. (Blue for science buildings etc). Thanks ^w^
Very fun! Great time killer, you can put it down whenever without losing progress. Very much like Civilization 5 for mobile.
Probably my favorite game on the playstore. Based on one of my favorite games (civilization 5), no ads, and plenty of mods. Truly, this game deserves far more recognition
Not just the best 4x or strategy game, but the best game on Android period. Totally free AND Open Source, active development and offers everything Civ does.
Just remarkable. Don't let the graphics fool you, this is the real Civ V experience.
Excellent transcription.
Great game
A marvelous and complex strategy game..rate it 5 stars for good gameplay,mechanics and somewhat the texture!
It's Civ, but on Mobile. UI takes a bit to get used to due to how packed it is to fit the small screen. Still, it's great.

Simple, but brilliant. I think I prefer it over Civ6... but I'm biased cuz of weed detox. Anyway, the end is near. Repent with me!!! I hope we make it; I have faith God will getcha there if you believe!! Be blessed.
Excellent version of Civ for mobile.
I've had this app for a while now, and I have to admit it is amazing. The graphics are simple but good, and the game play is perfect and easy to learn. I highly recommend this game
Phenomenal.
Absolutely best strategy and kingdom game. But I wonder how to get more gold or income in faster way. Anywas it is the amongst the best game ever i had played before.
Great work! Can't wait to see what else gets added.
One of the best games
You have successfully brought the gameplay and feeling of one of my favorite games ever to my phone. Civ V is an amazing game and this is a very faithful low spec mobile port. 10/10
Best civilization style game on android

Other civilizations randomly declare war with us for no grievance at all. I was allied with a civ at 80 or something influence and he declared war on me. There should be some Nerf to creating new cities as just few unhappiness is not enough to disincentivise creating new cities. Each new city should reduce gold per turn by half because cities need maintainance and there should be an option to limit a no of cities a civ can build. There should be an option to assimilate allied CS without annexing
This game is a ton of fun.
Really fun altered civ 5 with mod support.
Probably the best civilization game I've ever played, excellent work!
Surprising well realized recreation
Amazing version of civilization on mobile. Good controls, loads very fast and it' totally free.

civilization IV will always be my favorite game of all time. played civ 5 and 6 but didnt really like them. i find UNCIV better than civ 5 or 6. the mechanics works better. game is small in size no ads constant updates. i wish this had better graphics more 3D even if size increases by 100mb. this would be the bomb. regardless. 5 stars.
The Best!
Very fun game. Good port of civ 5 for mobile users.

Unciv is basically a Civ5 game ported to mobile users. While I understand that many players would like change in certain aspects, like AI and difficulty, I feel like it would reduce the charm of the original game, where you can mock the stupid AI relentlessly while still being mad that they won a Science Victory 1 turn earlier than you. There is also the hard loading time, some players complain about that, however, this will also be the case when you make the same thing in a high-end PC.
Best strategy game on mobile tbh

Hands down the best game in the play store. I know civ 5 pretty well though so it was not hard for me to find my bearings. Amazing that this is free and no ads or other attempts to make you spend money. If the dev had a patreon I'd support there.
Perfect üëç
A great game. I was really looking for a game like this,I wish it could be better in the next updates
Good job

This is a beautiful port of Civilization 5 rendered in good old 2D. I love it! This should have been done for the whole series long ago. If I were in charge, I'd hire this developer to make that happen. They keep working on this app, and it keeps getting better. Please continue the brilliant work. Running without any issues on Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra.

I reviewed this game years ago, on a different account. Imagine my surprise to still see constant updates, and so much more content added. I loved the game years ago, and I love it again. Well done, this is the premier strategy go-to on mobile.

This was so awesome seeing a free civ game with no ads or in app purchases the game is alot of fun and is alot like civilization 5 with mods so that the game never gets old highly recommend if you like civilization games

I didn't know or care about Civilization, but I tried this out for laughs, and now I'm INTO IT, this is one of the best Mobile games I've ever played, and let me tell you, there arent many mobile games that are actually good, Unciv is one of the best Mobile games on the play store.

Honestly one of the better strategy games I've played on mobile. No ads or intrusive microtransactions. The gameplay has depth and character. My only gripe is, while there is considerable in game information and documentation, there's also a lot that isnt very specifically covered, namely in what the sub-types of 'great person' can or cant do. For example a great general isn't actually much good in combat, apparently.
While fun I find the AI to be stupid on many levels like why the hell are you attacking me second the AI is too overpowered getting 8 Divs with guns while just have 2 Riflemen and 1 Spec Ops...
Outstanding!!!
Only downside is, I play too long.
It'd be cool if you could buy land from other civ/city states.
The best civ for mobile.

When im not playing civ6 on pc I play Uniciv on mobile. this game is as close as the real deal as you can get. more maps are available in the mods setting this adds more content when the default maps get boring. when creating a new game there are so many options available to customize the maps, enable/disable certain functions, and how many city states in game. multiplayer is available if you have a friend who also plays civ6. i suggest playing this game on a tablet, smaller screens UI is small
This game is best but I think if he add some foreign affairs,diplomacy,fix some bug and limit military unit

Everything is perfect i finally found game which good clone of Civilization 5 whatever. Game is perfect but something strange with multiplayer could you fix it? Game is kinda cool actually! So much mods, addons, etc. Love the game but still issue with multiplayer, and also game got often updates. I like that!
It's a fun game but it won't stop constantly crashing every time I start to get into a game

It was wonderful utterly stunning with so much complexity and many different outcomes, variables, and factors that can dramatically change the way you play this great game and this compared to other makes the others look simple minded. Edit: I no English good. But you get what I mean, hopefully...
Great game, loved it all the way through. There were some problems I did have but overall, good game.
Wow This game is one of the best games l have ever played but what makes it the most outstanding is that the devs add new features all the time and that makes it better and better all the time
Great Game
Just wow üò≤ Awesome game, thank you.

Hello devs of Unciv, the game is fun and i made a world map with accurate locations of the civiliazations, theres a one thing that really need to be fix, its the farm ontop of the flood plains, the ground is black but the farm is not. So please fix it so ill give you a perfect rating. üòÉ
Good game yes but please add Norway.
Can you please add more civs?

Great game makes me so nostalgic civ 1 through 5 yeeeeee! Buuuuut, every single time I attack a city the game crashes. It's loads quickly and loads up rt after the attack was calculated and I continue from there and there are glitches like buildings that should be replaced by special civ specific versions are still buildable in addition to the ones that replace them. Minor deets great game.
Such a good game
Sid Meier's: Abridged

Now I actually know how to play this game fair and square. I also like to use addons for additional fun and chaos. I like this game for it has what civilization has on pc but downsized and more creative.
Great work! Excellent port from pc.
Great game overall and fun too play. Gameplay can seem very slow towards the end phase of a match, but nothing too severe.
A game that rivals Doom in the ability to work on all systems ‚ù§Ô∏èü©∏ü§§

Incredible achievement, hard to go back to the real thing now - fast, streamlined and addictive. If you like Civ, then get this now and you will not look back. My one quibble with this version is I am unable to promote units, as the game will not allow me to select a promotion. Probably just a bug that will be ironed out, so nothing huge.
Fantastic, closest you'll get to old school civilization 2/3 on Android
Great community project to bring Civilization 5 to Android!
Best game I've ever played on a mobile!
Maybe You should add in civilopidea How General Works Engineer,Khan,Artist
Excellent job!
It is a great 4X game! Just like Civilization 5 is! It even supports Mods!
Too complex im stuck in tutorial
One of the best mobile games I've played, lots of great mods that are easy to use, and the base game is CONSTANTLY updated and improved. I can't recommend it enough!

The game is awesome and ansolutely fun once you understand the core mechanics but id really like to suggest that could you please make the multiplayer much simlier even better if it needs LAN multiplayer if you promise 5 stars

The fact you don't know how much i regretted uninstalling this i looked everywhere for it because i forgot its name. It is one of the best game that has been made i would like to thank the maker of this game. Thank you thank you very much im in love with this game its a game that cant be told with only words i would love to donate but im unable to do so but if i have any chance i would support this game 100% thank you very much and i would like you to continue work on this game.
This is amazing! Thank you so much for making this game. I spend way too much time on it you are awesome üëç

Outstanding RTS game, and proof that the gameplay loop matters more than high-quality graphics. A suggestion would be to permit stacking of units in cities and forts - at the moment they have to be spread over the countryside. Another thing: is religion supposed to be turned off when using the vanilla ruleset? This happened to me, don't know if it is a bug or not.

All I wanted from civ game on mobile. The game is awesome. It's not bothering you with intrusive ads. Not offering purchase some internal currency to play. You did great job. At this point of playability the game has everything to be purchased. Solid finished product. I have to admit that all of my impressions are related to single player mode. Have not tried multiplayer - not my type of game)).
simply the best game and app on this platform, full functionalities and performance without ads... even mods this is ridiculous, support the creators!
gg geming
dude you are best man, as a mobile f2plyr I always wanted to try out civilization series / strategies games Real thanks to you
Hi,Iam having a with my land troops they are not able to move in water can you fix this
Actually just a well built and fun game, and it's pretty faithful to the actual Civilization games.
Game sucks, all IA countries learn everything from said tec period once they reach it. Cant keep up as the play and they dpam ouy new units in two turns
Will you eventually be able to adapt Brave New World as official ruleset for this game soon?
Easily the best game in the store
fab
The people who do not understand the tutorial, they are fools. They are not left brained or right brained; they are no brained
Really good game I would however suggest a random multiplayer mode so you can play with random people but that's just a idea
Great game

Add a customized placement of the "Next Turn" button and you got yourself a perfect game. But seriously though, as someone playing this in portrait mode/one hand mode, the current placement of "Next Turn" button is quite an annoyance.
I've been playing thing game since a year ago. It's waaay different from what it was originally and I love it!
